extends java.lang.Object

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract C attach()
      Deprecated. 
      The component is automatically attached. There is no need to call this method. TODO(jongerrish): Make this method private so that it can only be called internally, should not be part of the API.
      abstract C create() 
      abstract C destroy() 
      T get() 
      android.content.Intent getIntent() 
      protected C invokeWhilePaused(java.lang.String methodName, ReflectionHelpers.ClassParameter<?>... classParameters) 
      C withIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
      Deprecated. 
      Prefer passing the Intent through the constructor instead, it is safer as this method is broken for ActivityController where it is called after attach(). This method will be removed in a forthcoming release.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        @Deprecated
public C withIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
        Deprecated. Prefer passing the Intent through the constructor instead, it is safer as this method is broken for ActivityController where it is called after attach(). This method will be removed in a forthcoming release.

      • attach

        @Deprecated
public abstract C attach()
        Deprecated. The component is automatically attached. There is no need to call this method. TODO(jongerrish): Make this method private so that it can only be called internally, should not be part of the API.
